text: Deadly Friend is a 1986 American science-fiction horror movie directed by Wes Craven and based on the 1985 novel Friend by Diana Henstell. It starred Anne Ramsey, Kristy Swanson, Matthew Laborteaux, Anne Towney and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 science fiction movies Category:1986 horror movies Category:1980s science fiction horror movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Movies directed by Wes Craven Category:Screenplays by Bruce Joel Rubin
title: Deadly Friend
